Apple's Tim Cook calls for calm heads on China, US trade https://www.cnbc.com/2018/03/24/apples-tim-cook-calls-for-calm-heads-on-china-us-trade.html

links.title: Apple's Tim Cook calls for calm heads on China, US trade
links.description: Apple Chief Executive Tim Cook on Saturday called for "calm heads" and more open trade, amid rising fears of a trade war between the United States and China. Trade tension between China and the United States flared this week when President Donald Trump unveiled plans on Thursday to slap tariffs on potentially up to $60 billion in Chinese goods.

message.body: $AAPL can’t happen on iOS. It’s "locked down" as Android fans are commonly heard to complain. APIs are not exposed. https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2018/03/facebook-scraped-call-text-message-data-for-years-from-android-phones/

links.title: Facebook scraped call, text message data for years from Android phones
links.description: This past week, a New Zealand man was looking through the data Facebook had collected from him in an archive he had pulled down from the social networking site.

links.title: 5 Reasons to Buy Apple Stock and Hold for the Long Term
links.description: When Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) released its most recent financial results , the numbers were scrutinized by Wall Street. Even in light of its record-breaking performance, investors appeared to want even more. That may have been the result of some confusion about year-over-year unit sales comparisons, as one fewer week in the current-year quarter distorted the results compared to the prior year.
